value.name: Police responding to disturbance fatally shoot Tennessee man
value.description: A man was fatally shot by police in Tennessee who were responding to a shooting, officials said. Clarksville police were sent to a home around 8 p.m. Saturday in response to a domestic disturbance involving a shooting,

value.name: Woman shot by ex-boyfriend describes what led to his death in shootout with Clarksville police
value.description: When Shequita Jones stepped out of the shower on Saturday, she saw Adonis Traughber, her live-in ex-boyfriend, standing in the bathroom. He stared at her. Jones, caught off-guard, asked him what ...

value.name: Gunman killed by police: Ex-girlfriend relives weeks before Clarksville shooting in search for answers
value.description: "I'm going to need some counseling, I can assure you of that," Shequita Jones said with a nervous titter. "Just my garage door opening is a trigger."

video.name: Gunman killed by police: Ex-girlfriend relives weeks before Clarksville shooting in search for answers | ClarksvilleNow.com

value.name: UPDATE: TBI identifies man killed during gunfire with police
value.description: The suspect shot and killed by police after exchanging gunfire on Hedge Apple Drive Saturday night has been identified as 54-year-old Adonis Traughber, according to a news release from the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation.

value.name: TBI identifies man shot by Clarksville officers after domestic incident
value.description: Officers returned fire and shot him. The victim has been identified as Adonis Traughber, 54. He was taken to a hospital where he later died. A woman at the home was also shot and taken to a ...

value.name: Neighbors describe moments during Clarksville officer-involved shooting
value.description: Authorities said 54-year-old Adonis Traughber came out of a home in the 1000 block of Hedge Apple Drive and fired gunshots after reportedly shooting a woman inside the home. Officers then returned ...

value.name: Man shot, killed by Clarksville police during domestic disturbance call
value.description: When police got there the male suspect, identified as 54-year-old Adonis Traughber, came out of the home and fired shots. Officers returned fire, hitting Traughber, who died from his injuries.

value.name: Police Responding to Disturbance Fatally Shoot Tennessee Man
value.description: Officers returned fire, hitting Adonis Traughber, 54, the release said. Traughber died at a hospital. No officers were injured. The officers involved were not identified. The TBI is investigating.
